data.oai_dc:dc: Case file and coordinate data for big cat attack SatScan analysis (Packer et al)

Attack data used for the SatScan analysis for each Panthera population. The first tab is the case file data with the first column: case number, second column: number of cases (attacks in this case), third column: Year/Month. The second tab is the coordinate data (Latitude/Longitude) for each attack.
human-wildlife conflict|spatiotemporal clustering|early warning system|Genus Panthera|space-time scan method|anthropogenic landscape features|outbreak
